verse.name: Philippians 1:1
verse.Greek: Παῦλος καὶ Τιμόθεος δοῦλοι Χριστοῦ Ἰησοῦ Πᾶσιν τοῖς ἁγίοις ἐν Χριστῷ Ἰησοῦ τοῖς οὖσιν ἐν Φιλίπποις σὺν ἐπισκόποις καὶ διακόνοις
verse.ULB: Paul and Timothy, servants of Christ Jesus, to all God's holy people in Christ Jesus who are at Philippi, with the overseers and deacons.
verse.residue: and , of , to all God's people who are at , with the and .

verse.name: Philippians 1:2
verse.Greek: Χάρις ὑμῖν καὶ εἰρήνη ἀπὸ Θεοῦ Πατρὸς ἡμῶν καὶ Κυρίου Ἰησοῦ Χριστοῦ
verse.ULB: May grace be to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
verse.residue: May be to you and from our and the .

verse.name: Philippians 1:3
verse.Greek: Εὐχαριστῶ τῷ Θεῷ μου ἐπὶ πάσῃ τῇ μνείᾳ ὑμῶν
verse.ULB: I thank my God every time I remember you,
verse.residue: I thank my every time I remember you,

verse.name: Philippians 1:4
verse.Greek: πάντοτε ἐν πάσῃ δεήσει μου ὑπὲρ πάντων ὑμῶν μετὰ χαρᾶς τὴν δέησιν ποιούμενος
verse.ULB: always, in every prayer of mine for all of you, making my prayer with joy
verse.residue: always, in every of mine for all of you, making my with

verse.name: Philippians 1:5
verse.Greek: ἐπὶ τῇ κοινωνίᾳ ὑμῶν εἰς τὸ εὐαγγέλιον ἀπὸ τῆς πρώτης ἡμέρας ἄχρι τοῦ νῦν
verse.ULB: because of your partnership in the gospel from the first day until now.
verse.residue: because of your in the from the first until now.

verse.name: Philippians 1:6
verse.Greek: πεποιθὼς αὐτὸ τοῦτο ὅτι ὁ ἐναρξάμενος ἐν ὑμῖν ἔργον ἀγαθὸν ἐπιτελέσει ἄχρι ἡμέρας Χριστοῦ Ἰησοῦ
verse.ULB: I am confident of this very thing, that he who began a good work in you will continue to complete it until the day of Jesus Christ.
verse.residue: I am of this very thing, that he who began a in you will continue to complete it until the .

verse.name: Philippians 1:7
verse.Greek: Καθώς ἐστιν δίκαιον ἐμοὶ τοῦτο φρονεῖν ὑπὲρ πάντων ὑμῶν διὰ τὸ ἔχειν με ἐν τῇ καρδίᾳ ὑμᾶς ἔν τε τοῖς δεσμοῖς μου καὶ ἐν τῇ ἀπολογίᾳ καὶ βεβαιώσει τοῦ εὐαγγελίου συνκοινωνούς μου τῆς χάριτος πάντας ὑμᾶς ὄντας
verse.ULB: It is proper for me to feel this way about all of you because I have you in my heart. You all have been my partners in grace both in my imprisonment and in my defense and confirmation of the gospel.
verse.residue: It is for me to feel this way about all of you because I have you in my . You all have been my partners in both in my and in my defense and of the .

verse.name: Philippians 1:8
verse.Greek: μάρτυς γάρ μου ὁ Θεός ὡς ἐπιποθῶ πάντας ὑμᾶς ἐν σπλάγχνοις Χριστοῦ Ἰησοῦ
verse.ULB: For God is my witness, how I long for all of you with the compassion of Christ Jesus.
verse.residue: For is my , how I long for all of you with the compassion of .

verse.name: Philippians 1:9
verse.Greek: Καὶ τοῦτο προσεύχομαι ἵνα ἡ ἀγάπη ὑμῶν ἔτι μᾶλλον καὶ μᾶλλον περισσεύῃ ἐν ἐπιγνώσει καὶ πάσῃ αἰσθήσει
verse.ULB: So this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and all understanding
verse.residue: So this is my : that your may more and more in knowledge and all

verse.name: Philippians 1:10
verse.Greek: εἰς τὸ δοκιμάζειν ὑμᾶς τὰ διαφέροντα ἵνα ἦτε εἰλικρινεῖς καὶ ἀπρόσκοποι εἰς ἡμέραν Χριστοῦ
verse.ULB: so that you may approve what is excellent, and so you may be sincere and blameless until the day of Christ,
verse.residue: so that you may approve what is excellent, and so you may be sincere and until the of ,

verse.name: Philippians 1:11
verse.Greek: πεπληρωμένοι καρπὸν δικαιοσύνης τὸν διὰ Ἰησοῦ Χριστοῦ εἰς δόξαν καὶ ἔπαινον Θεοῦ
verse.ULB: filled with the fruit of righteousness that comes through Jesus Christ to the glory and praise of God.
verse.residue: filled with the of that comes through to the and praise of .

verse.name: Philippians 1:12
verse.Greek: Γινώσκειν δὲ ὑμᾶς βούλομαι ἀδελφοί ὅτι τὰ κατ᾽ ἐμὲ μᾶλλον εἰς προκοπὴν τοῦ εὐαγγελίου ἐλήλυθεν
verse.ULB: Now I want you to know, brothers, that what has happened to me has really served to advance the gospel.
verse.residue: Now I want you to , , that what has happened to me has really served to advance the .

verse.name: Philippians 1:13
verse.Greek: ὥστε τοὺς δεσμούς μου φανεροὺς ἐν Χριστῷ γενέσθαι ἐν ὅλῳ τῷ πραιτωρίῳ καὶ τοῖς λοιποῖς πᾶσιν
verse.ULB: As a result, my chains in Christ came to light throughout the whole palace guard and to everyone else.
verse.residue: As a result, my came to light throughout the whole guard and to everyone else.

verse.name: Philippians 1:14
verse.Greek: καὶ τοὺς πλείονας τῶν ἀδελφῶν ἐν Κυρίῳ πεποιθότας τοῖς δεσμοῖς μου περισσοτέρως τολμᾶν ἀφόβως τὸν λόγον λαλεῖν
verse.ULB: Most of the brothers have far more confidence in the Lord because of my chains, and they have courage to fearlessly speak the word.
verse.residue: Most of the have far more because of my , and they have to speak the .

verse.name: Philippians 1:15
verse.Greek: Τινὲς μὲν καὶ διὰ φθόνον καὶ ἔριν τινὲς δὲ καὶ δι᾽ εὐδοκίαν τὸν Χριστὸν κηρύσσουσιν
verse.ULB: Some indeed even proclaim Christ out of envy and strife, and also others out of good will.
verse.residue: Some indeed even out of and strife, and also others out of will.

verse.name: Philippians 1:16
verse.Greek: οἱ μὲν ἐξ ἀγάπης εἰδότες ὅτι εἰς ἀπολογίαν τοῦ εὐαγγελίου κεῖμαι
verse.ULB: The latter do it out of love, knowing that I am put here for the defense of the gospel.
verse.residue: The latter do it out of , that I am put here for the defense of the .

verse.name: Philippians 1:17
verse.Greek: οἱ δὲ ἐξ ἐριθείας τὸν Χριστὸν καταγγέλλουσιν οὐχ ἁγνῶς οἰόμενοι θλῖψιν ἐγείρειν τοῖς δεσμοῖς μου
verse.ULB: But the former proclaim Christ out of selfish ambition, not sincerely. They think they will cause me distress while I am in chains.
verse.residue: But the former out of selfish ambition, not sincerely. They think they will cause me while I am in .

verse.name: Philippians 1:18
verse.Greek: Τί γάρ πλὴν ὅτι παντὶ τρόπῳ εἴτε προφάσει εἴτε ἀληθείᾳ Χριστὸς καταγγέλλεται καὶ ἐν τούτῳ χαίρω ἀλλὰ καὶ χαρήσομαι
verse.ULB: What then? Only that in every way—whether from false motives or from true—Christ is proclaimed, and in this I rejoice. Yes, and I will rejoice,
verse.residue: What then? Only that in every way—whether from false motives or from — is , and in this I . Yes, and I will ,

verse.name: Philippians 1:19
verse.Greek: οἶδα γὰρ ὅτι τοῦτό μοι ἀποβήσεται εἰς σωτηρίαν διὰ τῆς ὑμῶν δεήσεως καὶ ἐπιχορηγίας τοῦ Πνεύματος Ἰησοῦ Χριστοῦ
verse.ULB: for I know that this will result in my deliverance through your prayers and the help of the Spirit of Jesus Christ.
verse.residue: for I that this will result in my through your and the help of the of .

verse.name: Philippians 1:20
verse.Greek: κατὰ τὴν ἀποκαραδοκίαν καὶ ἐλπίδα μου ὅτι ἐν οὐδενὶ αἰσχυνθήσομαι ἀλλ᾽ ἐν πάσῃ παρρησίᾳ ὡς πάντοτε καὶ νῦν μεγαλυνθήσεται Χριστὸς ἐν τῷ σώματί μου εἴτε διὰ ζωῆς εἴτε διὰ θανάτου
verse.ULB: It is my eager expectation and hope that I will in no way be ashamed, but with all boldness, now as always, Christ will be exalted in my body, whether by life or by death.
verse.residue: It is my eager expectation and that I will in no way be , but with all , now as always, will be exalted in my , whether by or by .

verse.name: Philippians 1:21
verse.Greek: Ἐμοὶ γὰρ τὸ ζῆν Χριστὸς καὶ τὸ ἀποθανεῖν κέρδος
verse.ULB: For to me to live is Christ and to die is gain.
verse.residue: For to me to is and to is gain.

verse.name: Philippians 1:22
verse.Greek: εἰ δὲ τὸ ζῆν ἐν σαρκί τοῦτό μοι καρπὸς ἔργου καὶ τί αἱρήσομαι οὐ γνωρίζω
verse.ULB: But if I am to live in the flesh, that means fruitful labor for me. Yet which to choose? I do not know.
verse.residue: But if I am to in the , that means for me. Yet which to ? I do not .

verse.name: Philippians 1:23
verse.Greek: συνέχομαι δὲ ἐκ τῶν δύο τὴν ἐπιθυμίαν ἔχων εἰς τὸ ἀναλῦσαι καὶ σὺν Χριστῷ εἶναι πολλῷ γὰρ μᾶλλον κρεῖσσον
verse.ULB: For I am hard pressed between the two. My desire is to depart and be with Christ, which is far better,
verse.residue: For I am pressed between the two. My is to depart and be with , which is far better,

verse.name: Philippians 1:24
verse.Greek: τὸ δὲ ἐπιμένειν ἐν τῇ σαρκὶ ἀναγκαιότερον δι᾽ ὑμᾶς
verse.ULB: yet to remain in the flesh is more necessary for your sake.
verse.residue: yet to remain in the is more necessary for your sake.

verse.name: Philippians 1:25
verse.Greek: Καὶ τοῦτο πεποιθὼς οἶδα ὅτι μενῶ καὶ παραμενῶ πᾶσιν ὑμῖν εἰς τὴν ὑμῶν προκοπὴν καὶ χαρὰν τῆς πίστεως
verse.ULB: Being convinced of this, I know that I will remain and continue with you all, for your progress and joy in the faith,
verse.residue: Being of this, I that I will remain and continue with you all, for your progress and in the ,

verse.name: Philippians 1:26
verse.Greek: ἵνα τὸ καύχημα ὑμῶν περισσεύῃ ἐν Χριστῷ Ἰησοῦ ἐν ἐμοὶ διὰ τῆς ἐμῆς παρουσίας πάλιν πρὸς ὑμᾶς
verse.ULB: so that in me you may have increasing reasons to boast in Christ Jesus when I come to you again.
verse.residue: so that in me you may have reasons to when I come to you again.

verse.name: Philippians 1:27
verse.Greek: Μόνον ἀξίως τοῦ εὐαγγελίου τοῦ Χριστοῦ πολιτεύεσθε ἵνα εἴτε ἐλθὼν καὶ ἰδὼν ὑμᾶς εἴτε ἀπὼν ἀκούω τὰ περὶ ὑμῶν ὅτι στήκετε ἐν ἑνὶ πνεύματι μιᾷ ψυχῇ συναθλοῦντες τῇ πίστει τοῦ εὐαγγελίου
verse.ULB: Only conduct yourselves in a manner worthy of the gospel of Christ, so that whether I come to see you or am absent, I may hear about you, that you are standing firm in one spirit, with one mind striving together for the faith of the gospel.
verse.residue: Only yourselves in a manner of the of , so that whether I come to see you or am absent, I may about you, that you are standing firm in one , with one for the of the .

verse.name: Philippians 1:28
verse.Greek: καὶ μὴ πτυρόμενοι ἐν μηδενὶ ὑπὸ τῶν ἀντικειμένων ἥτις ἐστὶν αὐτοῖς ἔνδειξις ἀπωλείας ὑμῶν δὲ σωτηρίας καὶ τοῦτο ἀπὸ Θεοῦ
verse.ULB: Do not be frightened in any respect by those who are your opponents. This is a sign to them of their destruction, but of your salvation—and this from God.
verse.residue: Do not be frightened in any respect by those who are your . This is a to them of their , but of your —and this from .

verse.name: Philippians 1:29
verse.Greek: ὅτι ὑμῖν ἐχαρίσθη τὸ ὑπὲρ Χριστοῦ οὐ μόνον τὸ εἰς αὐτὸν πιστεύειν ἀλλὰ καὶ τὸ ὑπὲρ αὐτοῦ πάσχειν
verse.ULB: For it has been freely given to you for the sake of Christ not only to believe in him, but also to suffer for his sake,
verse.residue: For it has been given to you for the sake of not only to in him, but also to for his sake,

verse.name: Philippians 1:30
verse.Greek: τὸν αὐτὸν ἀγῶνα ἔχοντες οἷον εἴδετε ἐν ἐμοὶ καὶ νῦν ἀκούετε ἐν ἐμοί
verse.ULB: having the same conflict which you saw in me, and now you hear in me.
verse.residue: having the same conflict which you saw in me, and now you in me.

verse.name: Philippians 2:1
verse.Greek: Εἴ τις οὖν παράκλησις ἐν Χριστῷ εἴ τι παραμύθιον ἀγάπης εἴ τις κοινωνία Πνεύματος εἴ τις σπλάγχνα καὶ οἰκτιρμοί
verse.ULB: If there is any encouragement in Christ, if there is any comfort provided by love, if there is any fellowship in the Spirit, if there are any tender mercies and compassions,
verse.residue: If there is any , if there is any provided by , if there is any in the , if there are any tender and compassions,

verse.name: Philippians 2:2
verse.Greek: πληρώσατέ μου τὴν χαρὰν ἵνα τὸ αὐτὸ φρονῆτε τὴν αὐτὴν ἀγάπην ἔχοντες σύμψυχοι τὸ ἓν φρονοῦντες
verse.ULB: then make my joy full by being of the same mind, having the same love, being united in spirit, and having one purpose.
verse.residue: then my by being of the same , having the same , being united in , and having one purpose.

verse.name: Philippians 2:3
verse.Greek: μηδὲν κατ᾽ ἐριθείαν μηδὲ κατὰ κενοδοξίαν ἀλλὰ τῇ ταπεινοφροσύνῃ ἀλλήλους ἡγούμενοι ὑπερέχοντας ἑαυτῶν
verse.ULB: Do nothing out of ambition or empty conceit. Instead with humility consider others better than yourselves.
verse.residue: Do nothing out of ambition or empty conceit. Instead with others better than yourselves.

verse.name: Philippians 2:4
verse.Greek: μὴ τὰ ἑαυτῶν ἕκαστος σκοποῦντες ἀλλὰ καὶ τὰ ἑτέρων ἕκαστοι
verse.ULB: Let each of you look out not only for his own interests, but also for the interests of others.
verse.residue: Let each of you look out not only for his own interests, but also for the interests of others.

verse.name: Philippians 2:5
verse.Greek: Τοῦτο φρονεῖτε ἐν ὑμῖν ὃ καὶ ἐν Χριστῷ Ἰησοῦ
verse.ULB: Have this mind in yourselves which also was in Christ Jesus,
verse.residue: Have this in yourselves which also was ,

verse.name: Philippians 2:6
verse.Greek: Ὃς ἐν μορφῇ Θεοῦ ὑπάρχων οὐχ ἁρπαγμὸν ἡγήσατο τὸ εἶναι ἴσα Θεῷ
verse.ULB: who, though he existed in the form of God, \q did not consider his equality with God \q as something to hold on to.
verse.residue: who, though he in the form of , did not his equality with as something to hold on to.
verse.w: as something to hold on to.

verse.name: Philippians 2:7
verse.Greek: ἀλλὰ ἑαυτὸν ἐκένωσεν μορφὴν δούλου λαβών ἐν ὁμοιώματι ἀνθρώπων γενόμενος καὶ σχήματι εὑρεθεὶς ὡς ἄνθρωπος
verse.ULB: Rather, he emptied himself, \q taking the form of a servant, \q and he was born in the likeness of men. \q And being found in the form of a man,
verse.residue: Instead, he emptied himself by taking the form of a , and he was born in the of men.

verse.name: Philippians 2:8
verse.Greek: ἐταπείνωσεν ἑαυτὸν γενόμενος ὑπήκοος μέχρι θανάτου θανάτου δὲ σταυροῦ
verse.ULB: He humbled himself and became obedient to the point of death, \q even death on a cross!
verse.residue: He himself and became to the point of , even on a !

verse.name: Philippians 2:9
verse.Greek: Διὸ καὶ ὁ Θεὸς αὐτὸν ὑπερύψωσεν καὶ ἐχαρίσατο αὐτῷ τὸ ὄνομα τὸ ὑπὲρ πᾶν ὄνομα
verse.ULB: Therefore also God highly exalted him \q and gave him the name that is above every name,
verse.residue: Therefore also highly him. He him the that is above every .

verse.name: Philippians 2:10
verse.Greek: ἵνα ἐν τῷ ὀνόματι Ἰησοῦ πᾶν γόνυ κάμψῃ ἐπουρανίων καὶ ἐπιγείων καὶ καταχθονίων
verse.ULB: so that at the name of Jesus every knee should bow, \q in heaven and on earth and under the earth,
verse.residue: He did this so that in the of every knee should , the knees of those in heaven and on and under the .

verse.name: Philippians 2:11
verse.Greek: καὶ πᾶσα γλῶσσα ἐξομολογήσηται ὅτι ΚΥΡΙΟΣ ΙΗΣΟΥΣ ΧΡΙΣΤΟΣ εἰς δόξαν Θεοῦ Πατρός
verse.ULB: and every tongue confess that Jesus Christ is Lord, \q to the glory of God the Father.
verse.residue: He did this so that every should that is , to the of the .

verse.name: Philippians 2:12
verse.Greek: Ὥστε ἀγαπητοί μου καθὼς πάντοτε ὑπηκούσατε μὴ ὡς ἐν τῇ παρουσίᾳ μου μόνον ἀλλὰ νῦν πολλῷ μᾶλλον ἐν τῇ ἀπουσίᾳ μου μετὰ φόβου καὶ τρόμου τὴν ἑαυτῶν σωτηρίαν κατεργάζεσθε
verse.ULB: So then, my beloved, as you always obey, not only in my presence but now much more in my absence, work out your own salvation with fear and trembling.
verse.residue: So then, my , you always , not only in my presence but now much more in my absence, out your own with and .

verse.name: Philippians 2:13
verse.Greek: Θεὸς γάρ ἐστιν ὁ ἐνεργῶν ἐν ὑμῖν καὶ τὸ θέλειν καὶ τὸ ἐνεργεῖν ὑπὲρ τῆς εὐδοκίας
verse.ULB: For it is God who is working in you both to will and to work for his good pleasure.
verse.residue: For it is who is working in you both to will and to for his .

verse.name: Philippians 2:14
verse.Greek: Πάντα ποιεῖτε χωρὶς γογγυσμῶν καὶ διαλογισμῶν
verse.ULB: Do all things without complaining or arguing
verse.residue: Do all things without complaining or arguing

verse.name: Philippians 2:15
verse.Greek: ἵνα γένησθε ἄμεμπτοι καὶ ἀκέραιοι τέκνα Θεοῦ ἄμωμα μέσον γενεᾶς σκολιᾶς καὶ διεστραμμένης ἐν οἷς φαίνεσθε ὡς φωστῆρες ἐν κόσμῳ
verse.ULB: so that you may become blameless and pure, children of God without blemish in the middle of a crooked and depraved generation, in which you shine as lights in the world.
verse.residue: so that you may become and , without in the middle of a and depraved , in which you shine as in the .

verse.name: Philippians 2:16
verse.Greek: λόγον ζωῆς ἐπέχοντες εἰς καύχημα ἐμοὶ εἰς ἡμέραν Χριστοῦ ὅτι οὐκ εἰς κενὸν ἔδραμον οὐδὲ εἰς κενὸν ἐκοπίασα
verse.ULB: Hold on to the word of life so that on the day of Christ I may boast that I did not run in vain or labor in vain.
verse.residue: Hold on to the of so that on the of I may that I did not in or in .

verse.name: Philippians 2:17
verse.Greek: Ἀλλὰ εἰ καὶ σπένδομαι ἐπὶ τῇ θυσίᾳ καὶ λειτουργίᾳ τῆς πίστεως ὑμῶν χαίρω καὶ συνχαίρω πᾶσιν ὑμῖν
verse.ULB: But even if I am being poured out as an offering on the sacrifice and service of your faith, I am glad and rejoice with you all.
verse.residue: But even if I am being poured out as an offering on the and of your , I am and with you all.
verse.w: I am being poured out as an offering

verse.name: Philippians 2:18
verse.Greek: τὸ δὲ αὐτὸ καὶ ὑμεῖς χαίρετε καὶ συνχαίρετέ μοι
verse.ULB: In the same manner you also should be glad and rejoice with me.
verse.residue: In the same manner you also should and with me.

verse.name: Philippians 2:19
verse.Greek: Ἐλπίζω δὲ ἐν Κυρίῳ Ἰησοῦ Τιμόθεον ταχέως πέμψαι ὑμῖν ἵνα κἀγὼ εὐψυχῶ γνοὺς τὰ περὶ ὑμῶν
verse.ULB: But I hope in the Lord Jesus to send Timothy to you soon, so that I may also be encouraged when I know the things about you.
verse.residue: But I to to you soon, so that I may also be when I the things about you.

verse.name: Philippians 2:20
verse.Greek: οὐδένα γὰρ ἔχω ἰσόψυχον ὅστις γνησίως τὰ περὶ ὑμῶν μεριμνήσει
verse.ULB: For I have no one else like him, who is truly concerned for you.
verse.residue: For I have no one else like him, who is truly concerned for you.

verse.name: Philippians 2:21
verse.Greek: οἱ πάντες γὰρ τὰ ἑαυτῶν ζητοῦσιν οὐ τὰ Ἰησοῦ Χριστοῦ
verse.ULB: For they all seek their own interests, not the things of Jesus Christ.
verse.residue: For they all their own interests, not the things of .

verse.name: Philippians 2:22
verse.Greek: τὴν δὲ δοκιμὴν αὐτοῦ γινώσκετε ὅτι ὡς πατρὶ τέκνον σὺν ἐμοὶ ἐδούλευσεν εἰς τὸ εὐαγγέλιον
verse.ULB: But you know his proven worth, because as a son with his father, so he served with me in the gospel.
verse.residue: But you his proven worth, because as a with his , so he with me in the .

verse.name: Philippians 2:23
verse.Greek: Τοῦτον μὲν οὖν ἐλπίζω πέμψαι ὡς ἂν ἀφίδω τὰ περὶ ἐμὲ ἐξαυτῆς
verse.ULB: So I hope to send him as soon as I see how things will go with me.
verse.residue: So I to him as soon as I see how things will go with me.

verse.name: Philippians 2:24
verse.Greek: πέποιθα δὲ ἐν Κυρίῳ ὅτι καὶ αὐτὸς ταχέως ἐλεύσομαι
verse.ULB: But I am confident in the Lord that I myself will also come soon.
verse.residue: But I am that I myself will also come soon.

verse.name: Philippians 2:25
verse.Greek: Ἀναγκαῖον δὲ ἡγησάμην Ἐπαφρόδιτον τὸν ἀδελφὸν καὶ συνεργὸν καὶ συστρατιώτην μου ὑμῶν δὲ ἀπόστολον καὶ λειτουργὸν τῆς χρείας μου πέμψαι πρὸς ὑμᾶς
verse.ULB: But I think it is necessary to send Epaphroditus back to you. He is my brother and fellow worker and fellow soldier, and your messenger and servant for my needs.
verse.residue: But I it is necessary to Epaphroditus back to you. He is my and and fellow , and your and for my needs.

verse.name: Philippians 2:26
verse.Greek: ἐπειδὴ ἐπιποθῶν ἦν πάντας ὑμᾶς καὶ ἀδημονῶν διότι ἠκούσατε ὅτι ἠσθένησεν
verse.ULB: For he was very distressed, and he longed to be with you all, because you heard that he was sick.
verse.residue: For he was very distressed, and he longed to be with you all, because you that he was sick.

verse.name: Philippians 2:27
verse.Greek: καὶ γὰρ ἠσθένησεν παραπλήσιον θανάτῳ ἀλλὰ ὁ Θεὸς ἠλέησεν αὐτόν οὐκ αὐτὸν δὲ μόνον ἀλλὰ καὶ ἐμέ ἵνα μὴ λύπην ἐπὶ λύπην σχῶ
verse.ULB: For indeed he was so sick that he almost died. But God had mercy on him, and not on him only, but also on me, so that I might not have sorrow upon sorrow.
verse.residue: For indeed he was so sick that he almost . But had on him, and not on him only, but also on me, so that I might not have upon .

verse.name: Philippians 2:28

verse.ULB: Let your gentleness be known to all people. The Lord is near.

verse.name: Philippians 4:6

verse.name: Philippians 4:7

verse.name: Philippians 4:9
verse.Greek: ἃ καὶ ἐμάθετε καὶ παρελάβετε καὶ ἠκούσατε καὶ εἴδετε ἐν ἐμοί ταῦτα πράσσετε καὶ ὁ Θεὸς τῆς εἰρήνης ἔσται μεθ᾽ ὑμῶν

verse.name: Philippians 4:10
verse.Greek: Ἐχάρην δὲ ἐν Κυρίῳ μεγάλως ὅτι ἤδη ποτὲ ἀνεθάλετε τὸ ὑπὲρ ἐμοῦ φρονεῖν ἐφ᾽ ᾧ καὶ ἐφρονεῖτε ἠκαιρεῖσθε δέ

verse.residue: I greatly because now at last you have renewed your concern for me. You had indeed been concerned for me before, but there was no opportunity for you to help.

verse.name: Philippians 4:11

verse.ULB: I am not saying this because I am in need. For I have learned to be content in all circumstances.
verse.residue: I am not saying this because I am in need. For I have learned to be content in all circumstances.

verse.name: Philippians 4:12
verse.Greek: οἶδα καὶ ταπεινοῦσθαι οἶδα καὶ περισσεύειν ἐν παντὶ καὶ ἐν πᾶσιν μεμύημαι καὶ χορτάζεσθαι καὶ πεινᾶν καὶ περισσεύειν καὶ ὑστερεῖσθαι
verse.ULB: I know what it is to be poor, and I also know what it is to have plenty. In every way and in all things I have learned the secret of how to be well fed or to be hungry, and how to have an abundance or to be in need.

verse.residue: I do all things through him who me.

verse.name: Philippians 4:15

verse.ULB: It is not that I seek the gift. Instead, I seek the fruit that increases to your credit.

verse.residue: My will meet all your needs according to his riches in .

verse.Greek: τῷ δὲ Θεῷ καὶ Πατρὶ ἡμῶν ἡ δόξα εἰς τοὺς αἰῶνας τῶν αἰώνων ἀμήν
verse.ULB: Now to our God and Father be the glory forever and ever. Amen.

verse.ULB: Greet all God's holy people in Christ Jesus. The brothers who are with me greet you.
verse.residue: Greet all God's people . The who are with me you.
